nodes.text: A planetoid was the site of a Mining Guild asteroid gas refinery during the age of the Galactic Empire. This planetoid's atmosphere was covered in Clouzon-36 gas, which was a source of food for the purrgil, a species of large space-dwelling creatures capable of traveling through hyperspace. About three years before the Battle of Yavin, the gas refinery was raided and destroyed by the Spectres and a herd of purrgil.
